WHEREAS clause (I) of Article 270 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan provides that Parliament may by law validate all Proclamations, President's Orders, Martial Law Regulations, Martial Law Orders and other laws made between the twenty-fifth day of March, 1969, and the nineteenth day of December, 1971 ; AND WHEREAS it is expedient to validate certain President's Orders, Martial Law Regulations, Martial Law Orders and other laws made asaforesaid ; It is hereby enacted as follows :— 1. Short title and commencement.___(1) This Act may be called the Validation of Laws Act, 1975. (2) It shall come into force at once. 2. Validation of laws.___ The laws mentioned in the Schedule are hereby declared to have been validly made by competent authority. _______ THE SCHEDULE [see section 2] Titles and Numbers of laws I.
